Name: Barrier
Description: The structure acts as a hard barrier to all aquatic species.
(Dams): Dam has no associated fishway structure.
(Waterfalls): Waterfall has a height of 5 m or greater.

Name: Partial Barrier
Description: The structure may act as a barrier to some aquatic species but may also be passable to others.
(Dams): A fishway structure is associated with the dam.
(Waterfalls): Waterfall has a height of less than 5 m.

Name: Passable
Description: The structure does not act as a barrier to aquatic species.

Name: Unknown
Description: The passability status of the structure is unknown.
